product_name: Not Your Mother'sCurl Talk Frizz Control Hair Sculpting Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNot Your Mother's Curl Talk Frizz Control Styling Gel gives you flake-free, defined curls with natural movement. Formulated with Rice Curl Complex, this flexible styling gel hydrates, conditions, and enhances curl retention while controlling frizz. Scrunch, style, and enjoy soft, touchable curls.
details: DetailsBenefitsDefines curls while maintaining natural movementProvides flake-free, flexible hold for touchable curlsHydrates and conditions with Rice Curl ComplexEnhances curl retention for long-lasting definitionControls frizz without stiffness or crunchLightweight formula won't weigh curls downPerfect for all curly and wavy hair types, including color-treated hairInfused with a citrus jasmine scent with notes of lemon, rose water & sandalwoodPairs perfectly with Curl Talk Defining Cream for extra hydration and bounceScent TypeCitrus Jasmine ScentFormulated WithoutSulfate surfactantsSiliconesParabensDrying alcoholItem 2530114How To UseTo use Curl Talk Frizz Control Sculpting Gel, scrunch into wet curly hair or comb through. Let dry or style as desired.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, VP/VA Copolymer, Propanediol, PVP, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lactobacillus/Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Keratin Amino Acids, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase, Carbomer, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide
how_to_use: To use Curl Talk Frizz Control Sculpting Gel, scrunch into wet curly hair or comb through. Let dry or style as desired.

reviews.headline: Awesome!
reviews.comments: Best gel ever!

reviews.headline: Cheapest Gel that WORKS
reviews.comments: It makes your hair crunchy at first but it gets better after oil or throughout the day but keeps the frizz away.

reviews.headline: one of my holy grails
reviews.comments:
If I was stranded on an island and could only bring two hair products, it would be this and the curl talk leave in. This gives me the perfect gel cast and once I break it leaves my hair so bouncy, shiney, and soft. 
the definition is incredible and I can get 3-4 days of pretty curls before washing again. I love this product so much

reviews.headline: Smells good, not for me
reviews.comments: Smells good. Gave tracel size a try. Didnt do much for my curls. Wont be buying again im afraid.

reviews.headline: No crunch, but did nothing for curls or frizz
reviews.comments: This was such an odd product - I liked the no-crunch and it made my hair soft and somewhat frizz free while air-drying, but once it dried, the frizz came right back and my hair felt dry and straw-like.

reviews.headline: Perfect gel for fine hair
reviews.comments: I have 2B-3A wavy hair that is growing out - this works wonderfully for curl definition. I use after a curl cream or air dry dream and follow with NYM Flash Freeze gel for best hold.

reviews.headline: Works well but gives me a headache
reviews.comments: It works well and makes my hair look so nice and wavy. I have type 2a hair (usually my hair is a little frizzy). But unfortunately it gives me a horrible headache every time I use it. I was trying to figure out why I had the worst headache for a few days on and off and then realized it happened every time I was using this product. If you're sensitive to smells, beware. You'll have nice hair but not feel well!

reviews.headline: may work for some, not me
reviews.comments: i was excited to use this gel because i love the not your mothers line! the first time i used it, i got some nice definition! but my curly felt very dry. the second time i used it, my hair was all frizzy, little to no definition, and it was VERY dry. i thought it was just my hair, but i washed my hair and tried my curly routine without it and it felt way better. unfortunately, too drying for my 3a/b curls :(

reviews.headline: Better options out there
reviews.comments: Fact of the matter is, there are better products out there this just didn't do it for me

reviews.headline: Not good on fine or soft straight hair
reviews.comments:
This was recommended by an Ulta associate for my almost completely straight hair.  There's no hold at all and it made my hair look greasy.  
Would probably work much better on coarse hair that needs smoothing vs styling.

reviews.headline: Good definition but dry
reviews.comments: I liked the smell and thought it gave good definition but my hair always felt so dry after using this. I'll keep looking for a more moisturizing curl gel

reviews.headline: Surprised
reviews.comments: I bought a Not Your Mother's gel in the past and I can't remember why I didn't re-purchase so I decided to try it again.  Well, I was pleasantly surprised!  It gave me a nice hold without being sticky or flaky.  I think I could actually use a bit more next time to achieve an even greater result.

reviews.headline: Zero hold, no definition, and frizz city. Don't buy!
reviews.comments: I have various curl patterns throughout, 3a underneath and a mixture of 3b and 3c ontop. This product had zero hold, absolutely no definition, and made my hair a frizzy mess. Also made my curly hair super stringy and look more like waves. 10/10 would NOT recommend. I only bought this product for traveling bc I didn't want to pay $10 for 2oz of Ouidad stronger hold gelâ€”mistakes were def made.

reviews.headline: i would buy again
reviews.comments: very good!

reviews.headline: Not my first choice
reviews.comments: Doesn't hold my hair much and doesn't give me the defined waves I want to achieve, but it'll do the work.

reviews.headline: savannah
reviews.comments: great for reducing frizz. love the hold

reviews.headline: I like the product but bothered my allergies.
reviews.comments: The product helped with fizziness but bothered my allergies . It has a strong scent and it bothered my eyes.

reviews.headline: Affordable Find
reviews.comments: This works really well for my 3c/4a hair. I use it after leave in conditioner when my hair is wet/damp and its absolutely my go to when im doing an updo. It makes my hair far less frizzy in an area where we see 90% plus humidity regularly.

reviews.headline: Worst gel I've ever used
reviews.comments: Bought this while I waited for my order to arrive after I ran out of gel. I am returning after one use. It's horrible. My hair feels like straw. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone ever.

reviews.headline: Yes, I will definitely buy this again
reviews.comments: My hair is wavy/curly. I've used John Freida "Clearly Defined" gel for many years. It's been discontinue and I've tried several other brands, and nothing works as well. I decided to try this gel, and I love it!

media.headline: Love the consistency (be careful when squeezing out)

faceoff_positive.comments: I was browsing Ulta for some new hair care products and came across NYM line! I can honestly say that this stuff is amazing, especially for the price point. My hair is very coarse, curly and needs moisture; this product gave me definition and moisture. Definitely recommend this brand
faceoff_positive.headline: Love It!

faceoff_negative.comments: It works on my curls but it made my hair dry like straw. My hair looks like crispy noodles.  I just wish it wasn't so drying.
faceoff_negative.headline: Works but makes hair really dry

rollup.name: Curl Talk Frizz Control Hair Sculpting Gel
